text:
While Half Of The B-Town Was At Ambani’s Bash, Other Half Celebrated Rani Mukerji’s Daughter Adira’s Birthday
While Half Of The B-Town Was At Ambani’s Bash, Other Half Celebrated Rani Mukerji’s Daughter Adira’s Birthday
Christmas and New Year are around the corner, but Bollywood has already kicked off the party season. After DeepVeer and NickYanka’s wedding, the B-Town was spotted at Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal’s pre-wedding celebrations in Udaipur last night.
While half of the Bollywood including Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Salman Khan, Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh among others were spotted at the bash last night, the other half was apparently at Rani Mukerji’s daughter Adira’s birthday party. This Sunday had all the party vibes for Bollywood stars.
YouTube/ An old picture of Rani Mukherji with her daughter Adira.
While Karan Johar was at the Ambani bash, his toddlers Yash and Roohi were spotted at Adira’s birthday bash accompanied by granny Hiroo Johar.
Similarly, while Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya were in Udaipur, Shweta Bachchan Nanda made it to the little one’s birthday celebrations.
Don't Miss 264 SHARES 357 SHARES 322 SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 234 SHARES
Soha Ali Khan with daughter Inaaya was there too.
Tusshar Kapoor also arrived with his son Lakshya.
Twinkle Khanna and Akshay Kumar’s daughter Nitara, and Shilpa Shetty, her son Viaan and husband Raj Kundra also graced the party.
But where was Taimur?
title: While Half Of The B-Town Was At Ambani’s Bash, Other Half Celebrated Rani Mukerji’s Daughter Adira’s Birthday
description: While half of the Bollywood including Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Salman Khan, Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh among others were spotted at the bash last night, the other half was apparently at Rani Mukherji’s daughter Adira’s birthday party. This Sunday had all the party vibes for Bollywood stars.
